title: There’s no need to panic about your iPhone’s low-battery notification anymore
content:
Macworld

There’s nothing quite as panic-inducing as seeing your iPhone battery die and receiving that dreaded ‘Low battery’ notification on your screen, especially if you’re out running errands or traveling. You might be able to save it from complete battery depletion with a cable, but that would require an outlet.

Instead of struggling to find an outlet, bring it back to life with the GRAVITY Pro power bank. This 100W fast-charging power bank is designed to keep your MacBook Pro, iPhone, iPad, AirPods, and other Apple gear fully charged anywhere for only $99.99 with free shipping.

Imagine never dealing with a dead iPhone or AirPods ever again—that’s possible with this sleek power bank. Check out its specs:

  • 100W USB-C fast charging to quickly revive MacBook Pros and other high-powered laptops.
  • 2 USB-C ports and 1 USB-A port so you can charge three devices at once.
  • Low-current mode to safely and speedily charge your AirPods, Apple Watch, and other small devices.
  • Smart LED display so you can see its real-time power status, input/output details, and the fast charge indicator.
  • Overheat, short-circuit, and over-voltage charging protection.

The GRAVITY Pro also comes with travel accessories, like a 120cm (about 47-inch) braided cable and a drawstring pouch for easy portability.

Bring speedy, reliable charging wherever you go with the Adam Elements GRAVITY Pro fast-charging power bank, now $99.99 while supplies last.
